phrs.translation: 金的, 奥里克, 奥瑞克, 澳里克
奥里克, 奥瑞克, 奥立克, 乔治·奥里克
氯化金, 三氯化金, 氯金酸
金手指, 奥瑞克金手指, 反派奥瑞克金手指

sentences.sentence: One can synthesize each chakra, subtle body, light body and greater auric field.
sentences.translation: 你能合成每一个脉轮、精细身体、光身体和更大的金场。

sentences.sentence: The result is that your own auric fields and Mer-Ka-Na Light Bodies are, through induction, becoming extreme energy in motion.
sentences.translation: 结果会导致你的黄金场和梅尔-卡-那光体经过感应，形成最终的能量运作。

sentences.sentence: It takes the primary form of a tissue capsule around the auric field and also smaller energy capsules around all of the atoms of the body.
sentences.translation: 它以一种薄膜胶囊式的基本形态来围绕金场，并以较小形态的能量胶囊围绕身体的所有原子。
